value:
$WmMPID_ミスト,ch09_03_Mist_F_Normal,Face|Jill! So you've come to Askr too!$k$p$WmMPID_ジル,ch09_17_Jill_F_Normal,Face|Mist! It's been a while. I hope
everyone is well.$k$p$WmMPID_ミスト,ch09_03_Mist_F_Normal,Face|Yes, everyone is good as ever.$k$pIke and some of the others are away
on a scouting mission at the moment,
but they should be back soon!$k$p$WmMPID_イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Normal,Face|Are meals with the Greil Mercenaries
good as ever too? I'd, um...like to try
some more...$k$p$WmMPID_ガトリー,ch09_20_Gatrie_M_Normal,Face|Hey-hey! Shinon and I are here too!$k$p$WmMPID_ミスト,ch09_03_Mist_F_Normal,Face|It's like everyone's coming back
together! A reunion of all us Greil
Mercenaries...$k$p$WmMPID_シノン,ch09_18_Chinon_M_Normal,Face|Hey, Mist... In a world like this,
I have to ask... Is the commander—
Is Commander Greil here?$k$p$WmMPID_ミスト,ch09_03_Mist_F_Normal,Face|Well, you could say that, but...$k$pHe just showed up for a festival,
and hasn't appeared outside of
that, really...$k$p$WmMPID_シノン,ch09_18_Chinon_M_Normal,Face|So that means...Ike is the commander
here too...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|All right, everyone! I hear you're in
for a REAL training session tomorrow,
so be sure to get some rest tonight!$k$p$WmMPID_ミスト,ch09_03_Mist_F_Normal,Face|All right, I have to go help out around
the castle, so I'll see you all later!$k$p$WmMPID_ジル,ch09_17_Jill_F_Normal,Face|All right. Sounds good, Mist.$k$p$WmMPID_シノン,ch09_18_Chinon_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ガトリー,ch09_20_Gatrie_M_Normal,Face|Hey... That Princess of Askr...
Sharena, right? She's kinda cute.
And she's not the only one either...$k$p$WmMPID_シノン,ch09_18_Chinon_M_Normal,Face|Hey, Jill, Ilyana... And Gatrie.
Help me out with something...$k$p$WmMPID_ジル,ch09_17_Jill_F_Normal,Face|Help you? With what?$k$p$WmMPID_シノン,ch09_18_Chinon_M_Normal,Face|We're all newcomers here, right?
We have to do something to prove
ourselves... Show our strength.$k$p$WmMPID_イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Normal,Face|Newcomers? I don't think we need
to do anything special, but...$k$pAnd if I try too hard, I might collapse
from hunger...$k$p$WmMPID_シノン,ch09_18_Chinon_M_Normal,Face|To come here, to this world...
and even here, Ike is commander...$k$pI can't stand by and just let him
take the Commander's place.$k$pI want to test him... Let's see if that
boy can fill the Commander's boots.$k$p
